name: Why Don't They Fix The D@#n Roads!?
name_original: Why Don't They Fix The D@#n Roads!?
description:
Why Don't They Fix The D@#n Roads!?

Have you ever wondered what the world would be like if somebody just went out and fixed the roads in Southeast Michigan? Well, now you can live that fantasy! Why Don't They Fix The D@#n Roads!? is a game where you get to play as the transportation manager of a city in Southeast Michigan. You get to allocate budget and labor to battle endless potholes and build the automotive utopia of your dreams! Or at least, one municipality within that utopia anyways.

Roleplay as the hero of transportation, or a crooked government bureaucrat in any of these fine Michigan cities:

  • Walled Lake
  • Detroit (Coming February 2021!)
  • Livonia (Coming February 2021!)
  • Hamtramck (Coming February 2021!)
  • Ann Arbor (Coming February 2021!)
  • Ypsilanti (Coming February 2021!)

A game by:

Sapphon
Tinfox
Wandream
Roland
Rymlks
